comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This looks like a NSW Public Works Department Harbour Bridge staff group. www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=389453 - this pic enables us to tentatively identify some of the people in this pic. The two gents I haven't noted might be W.H. Lush and W.R. Carroll, but that's a bit of a guess. For info on Eileen Bowker see www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=341641 also see the pic next door!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as... the caption accompanying this pic confirms Lush is the chap 2nd from the lhs.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as... similar group, different stairs, different day.
